[color=yellow]NOTES:[/color]


REASON FOR READNFO... SOURCE WAS SHIT. HE UPSCALED WHAT WAS PROBABLY AN OK SOURCE TIL HE GOT AHOLD OF IT AND 
CHANGED FRAMERATE AND RESOLUTION.. QUIT FUCKING SHIT UP PIMP YA FOOKIN IDIOT LEAVE SOURCE AS IS AT 29.97 FPS AND
720X??? RESOLUTION..... AND WE CUT OFF 99% OF THE BS PIMP OPENING..IT NOT ANYWHERE NEAR PERFECT BUT AT LEAST NOW
IT HAS SUM COLOR AND U CAN ACTUALLY WATCH IT AND ENJOY IT FOR THE MOST PART...

Now started with changing framerate and doin slight crop and resize then onto major denoising.. now we didnt remove
it all as that woulda cost alot of detail and there wasnt ht much to begin with.. then onto RGB, hue and slight 
saturation adjustments then took the decent audio and cleaned it up sum, adjsuted eq a lil bit .. 
enjoy til better source comes out which we hope is soon..
